description:
For over thirty years we've been winning claims against those causing harm to our clients. Our clients are individuals who have suffered physical, mental or emotional injury or damage to their property. Our goal is to recover for your medical bills, lost wages, pain, suffering, and loss of enjoyment of life and the economic loss, mental anguish and loss of companionship suffered by your family.

We handle all sorts of injuries, including car accidents, work related accidents, personal injury, medical malpractice, wrongful death, truck accidents, motorcycle accidents, slip and fall injuries, aviation accidents, nursing home injuries and any other personal injury, accident, negligence or tort matters.

Each lawyer in our firm has ten to thirty years of legal expertise.. Our staff speaks fluent Spanish.

To learn more about how our experienced personal injury lawyers can help you, contact us at 703-560-0700.
